main event: A sighting of a fiery light in the sky was reported in Dallas, Texas on April 22, 1950.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 minutes,The object was described as a 'fiery light' that turned on and off,It was observed that the light had no definite formation,The possibility of the sighting being an ordinary aircraft was suggested, and it was identified later that no aircraft were in the area during the time of the sighting.
witnesses: a residential building construction worker, a housewife, and two students
